text.text: What to expect with indicator cards
The indicators for each system/topic can be used to assess how well that system is doing relative to its potential for supporting equitable resilience.
] for each indicator selected in Step 1. Print out completed indicator cards to use in the workshop you hold in Step 3.
Where to get the information for each indicator card?
Some indicators may have an existing dataset you can link to, while others you may need to consult with a representative of a municipal, county, or state agency.
For the full list of indicators, refer to the indicators workbook.
